"Figure 1. Change in Latitude and Depth of Marine Species, 1982–2015",,
Source: EPA's Climate Change Indicators in the United States: www.epa.gov/climate-indicators,,
"Data source: NOAA and Rutgers University, 2016",,
Web update: August 2016,,
Units: miles (average distance moved); feet (average change in depth),,
,,
